about_the_game:
“Auspicious Light” is a large-scale military vehicle shooting game. The game contains several maps and vehicles for players to choose from. Players can also collect resources on the battlefield, recast their tanks, upgrade chips, and compete with 30 tanks to rebuild their new homes.

[Game Modes]
You can choose to defend the base, or be a brave man who charges into battle, utilizing tactical weapons, reasonable combinations, and collecting resources. You can fight alone or invite your friends to fight together as a team. The game contains a variety of game modes. For example，Confrontation, Mining, Capturing the Flag, Capturing the Train and Occupy the Base. We look forward to your arrival.



[Characteristic Chariots]
The game has several characteristic chariots, you can drive agile and lightweight armored vehicle to scout the enemy, or you can drive artillery vehicle with excellent firepower to shell the enemy from a distance, or you can use the explosive rocket vehicle to provide continuous firepower output. There is always a chariot for you.



[Functional Systems]
Players can enter the battlefield to collect resources, manufacture equipment, recast tanks, upgrade commanders and activate chips. Skill chips can be freely matched and assembled to enhance the performance of tanks. These make players invincible on the battlefield.



[Ultra-Realistic Maps]
The battlefield experience is ultra-realistic and includes beautiful scenery from all over the world. There are deserts, plains, hills, and the Gobi. You can take advantage of the geography and experience intense and exciting battle scenes.



[Huge Worldview]
The war zone is gradually expanding to the entire Eastern Theater. The situation is becoming more serious and intense. Will you be able to stand out from the crowd? Start as a new recruit and grow into an excellent general.

name: Auspicious Light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i513400 or AMD Ryzen 5 7600
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: “Auspicious Light”is a tactical competitive game with novel gameplay, exquisite graphics and stunning scenes. Players maneuver vehicles, collect materials, forge vehicles, recast modules, match chips and utilize exquisite tactics and strategies to defeat enemies and achieve combat goals.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
